ai:cl.c: Provides search functionality for use on Scintilla objects.

ai:m.c: Searches for a specific text string.
ai:m.p: ERR ss::Find(OBJECTPTR Object, INT * Pos, STF Flags)

ai:i.c: The position to start searching from. Set to -1 to start from the cursor position. This parameter is updated with the byte position of the discovered string sequence.
The byte-position of the discovered string sequence is returned here.

ai:m.c: Continues a text search in reverse.

ai:i.c: The byte-position of the discovered string is returned here.

ai:f.c: End of the current/most recent selection
Targets a Scintilla object for searching.
Start of the current/most recent selection
The string sequence to search for.
